head.title: Treasury Auctions Scheduled for This Week

hedline.hl1: Treasury Auctions Scheduled for This Week
hedline.hl2: Treasury Auctions Scheduled for This Week

block.p: The Treasury's schedule of financing this week included today's regular weekly auction of new three- and six-month bills and an auction of four-week bills tomorrow.

According to traders, at the close of the New York cash market on Friday, the rate on the outstanding three-month bill was 5.03 percent. The rate on the six-month issue was 5.06 percent, and the rate on the four-week issue was 5.06 percent.
The Treasury’s schedule of financing this week included today’s regular weekly auction of new three- and six-month bills and an auction of four-week bills tomorrow.
The Treasury's schedule of financing this week included today's regular weekly auction of new three- and six-month bills and an auction of four-week bills tomorrow.

According to traders, at the close of the New York cash market on Friday, the rate on the outstanding three-month bill was 5.03 percent. The rate on the six-month issue was 5.06 percent, and the rate on the four-week issue was 5.06 percent.
The following tax-exempt fixed-income issues are scheduled for pricing this week:
TAX EXEMPT
TUESDAY
Nashville Metro Government, Tenn., $184.2 million of debt securities. Competitive.
WEDNESDAY
Fresno County, Calif., $55.8 million of debt securities. Competitive.
Georgia, $578.5 million of general obligation bonds. Competitive.
TAX EXEMPT
ONE DAY DURING THE WEEK
California Public Works, $325 million of debt securities. Merrill Lynch.
Catholic Health East, $330 million of debt securities for Georgia, Pennsylvania, New Jersey and Massachusetts. Merrill Lynch.
Chattanooga Industrial Development Board, Tennessee, $56.9 million of lease rental revenue refunding bonds. Morgan Keegan & Co.
City of Garland Texas, $69 million of debt securities. Lehman Brothers.
Clark County, Nevada, Las Vegas-McCarran, $112 million of debt securities. Citigroup Global Markets.
Clark County, Nevada, Passenger Facility Charge, $103.7 million of debt securities. UBS Securities.
Henderson Health Care, Nevada, $110 million of debt securities for Catholic Health Care West. Citigroup Global Markets.
Hillsborough County, Florida School District, $84 million of certificates of participation. UBS Securities.
Independent School District of Glendale, Ariz., $65 million of debt securities for John C. Lincoln Hospital. Merrill Lynch.
Maricopa County, Arizona Industrial Development Authority, $172 million of debt securities for Catholic Health Care West. Citigroup Global Markets.
Michigan Housing, $70 million of debt securities. Merrill Lynch.
Michigan State Hospital Authority, $148 million of debt securities for Sparrow Health. Bear Stearns & Co.
Missouri State University, $59 million of debt securities. Raymond James & Associates.
Montana Facility Finance Authority, $125 million of hospital revenue bonds for Benefits Healthcare. Cain Brothers.
Moreno Valley, California Unified School District, $50 million of debt securities. George K. Baum & Co.
New Jersey Education, $115 million of debt securities for Kean University. Citigroup Global Markets.
New Jersey Multi-Family Housing, $54 million of debt securities. Merrill Lynch.
New Mexico Mortgage Finance Authority, $100 million of debt securities. George K. Baum & Co.
Oregon State Housing, $60 million of debt securities. Bear Stearns & Co.
Palomar Community College District, Calif., $160 million of general obligation bonds. RBC Capital Markets.
Reno Health Care, Nevada, $105 million of debt securities for Catholic Health Care West. Citigroup Global Markets.
Richmond County, Virginia Public Utility, $314 million of debt securities. Citigroup Global Markets.
Trustees of the California State University, $80 million of systemwide revenue bonds. Lehman Brothers.
Volusia County, Fla., $105 million of certificates of participation. Citigroup Global Markets.
